title: cmd/crontask/main.go
subtitle: Entry Point - Program Initialization
description:
Note: The architecture is modular by design. If you replace the complex task scheduling logic with a simple Print("Hello World") in the application's Run() method, the entire initialization sequence would still execute correctly.

Exit Code 0

Graceful shutdown after successful execution

Exit Code 1

Error termination during configuration loading or application runtime failures
author: A.M.Hamidipour
